The Mise en Place Experience

At "Mise en Place" Culinary Consulting I am able to utilize my 30+ years of professional Culinary Experience working together with you and your staff to create and inspire your team to make the most of your restaurant. Our past experiences with both the front and the back of the house includes luxury hotel food and beverage operations, independent restaurants, and Casinos. The restaurant consulting business in Arizona has a new "Fixer"Whether you have a start up restaurant concept or you are fixing up an existing restaurant I have a long record of successes. I have helped struggling resort hotels,restaurants and created several restaurant concepts from the ground up and have helped turn existing restaurants resorts and casino F&B operations from financial disasters to profitable operations.

My goal is to work one on one with you, the client. I offer a proven method to pinpoint your needs and then customize a plan of action to deliver the results you need. So, whether you are developing a project or have a existing operation, I can help you make it a functioning reality. Alternately, if you simply need some help fixing a problem, I will give you a hand getting things back on track. No matter what your needs are, with our diverse background I will find a solution for your food service business.
